testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from people who have transformed their financial situation with our services.

reviews.text: The application process was incredibly smooth. I received approval within hours and the funds were in my account the next day. Couldn't be happier with the service!
reviews.name: Michael Thompson
reviews.title: Personal Loan Customer

reviews.text: As a first-time homebuyer, I was nervous about the mortgage process. The team guided me through every step and secured me a great rate. I'm now happily settled in my new home!
reviews.name: Rebecca Johnson
reviews.title: Home Loan Customer

reviews.text: The business loan I received helped me expand my operations and hire two new employees. The flexible repayment terms have been perfect for managing my cash flow.
reviews.name: David Williams
reviews.title: Business Loan Customer

step1.title: Lodge Complaint
step1.item1: Contact your microlender directly regarding your complaint.
step1.item2: The microlender must respond within 20 business days.

step2.title: Escalate to NAMFISA
step2.item1: If unsatisfied with the response, escalate your complaint to NAMFISA.
step2.item2: Ensure you have written proof of your initial complaint.

step3.title: Contact Channels
step3.description: Submit your complaint through any of these channels:
step3.address: 51-55 Werner List Street, Gutenberg Plaza, Windhoek, Namibia
